title: Bikini and Half Leg Wax (£10) or Waxing Plus Eyebrow and EyelashTint (£18) at Charlie's Hair and Beauty
highlights:
• Centrally located salon
  • Waxing can take up to 45 minutes
  • Tinting can take up to 30 minutes
  • Upgrades available: full leg £5, Californian bikini £8, Brazilian £10, Hollywood £12
  • Upgrades available at reduced prices for Groupon customers
